title: >>> Final COUNTDOWN
body_text:
DODGEBALL LX has arrived and there is no turning back! Here is the final preview heading into the spectacle known as DODGEBALL LX ...
DODGEBALL LX Music
She's bringing it back is the youngest Nogueira sister ... the iPod! Kathryn Nogueira isn't a female titan for just any reason. The dedication for a game she herself rarely partakes in is unmatched. Thanks to her, music will be provided throughout the entire night via her very own iPod.
DODGEBALL LX Pageantry
Expect a bright look at DODGEBALL LX. Several players will be volunteering a little of their time before hand to help set-up the court for what should be one of the greatest displays at any dodgeball event. It's a sight combatants will have to wait and see.
DODGEBALL LX Awards
The awards have been finalized and before the action even gets under way, they will be presented to those deserving recipients. Categories already announced include the returning "Prodigy Award" as well the "Act of Courage" Award. As a bonus for simply reading the dodgeball website, another category has been released: the famed "Powerhouse Thrower" Award.
DODGEBALL LX Captains
What a rare happening already set for DODGEBALL LX. It's a 2-on-2 attraction for team pride and glory. This will certainly be a unique situation as like DODGEBALL 50, no one will know which players have formed an alliance. On top of that, who the winners will be is perhaps the bigger question.
DODGEBALL LX Extras
You just never know what's going to happen at these anticipated ten-events. Waterballoons, water guns, new stars, celebratory cakes, and even longtime returns have truly turned these season finales into the premiere events. It's a once in a lifetime event, so don't miss out!
